name: A Trip to the Moon
description:
A story-driven platformer inspired by "Un voyage dans la Lune".

Joypad supported and recommended!

Keyboard: arrow keys or wasd. SPACE to jump, "o" and "p" for actions.

Art and coding made by me, using Unity, Bolt and Procreate.

City, King background and main menu made by  @justinebarnay

Audio created using GarageBand including some samples from "Final-relache" by Erik Satie.
